description: The strong statement comes after the disappearance of leading opposition figure Maria Kolesnikova.
title: EU demands release of Belarus political prisoners and warns of sanctions
title_page: EU demands release of Belarus political prisoners and warns of sanctions - BBC News
maintext: Ms Tikhanovskaya said the latest detentions were an attempt to disrupt the work of the Co-ordination Council. "The more they try to scare us, the more people will take to the streets," she said in a statement from Lithuania.
